[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@rushstack/webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.md) &gt; [IEmbeddedDependenciesWebpackPluginOptions](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.iembeddeddependencieswebpackpluginoptions.md)

## IEmbeddedDependenciesWebpackPluginOptions interface

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Plugin options for EmbeddedDependenciesWebpackPlugin

**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface IEmbeddedDependenciesWebpackPluginOptions 
```

## Example


```ts
// webpack.config.js
plugins: [
 new EmbeddedDependenciesWebpackPlugin({
   outputFileName: 'custom-file-name.json',
   generateLicenseFile: true,
   generateLicenseFileFunction: (packages: IPackageData[]) => {
     return packages
       .map((pkg) => {
     return `<h2>${pkg.name}</h2><p>${pkg.license}</p>`;
    }).join('');
   },
 generatedLicenseFilename: 'custom-license-file-name.html'
 })
]
```

**_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Name of the generated license file. Defaults to THIRD-PARTY-NOTICES.html

[generateLicenseFile?](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.iembeddeddependencieswebpackpluginoptions.generatelicensefile.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Whether to generate a license file. Defaults to false and will only generate the embedded-dependencies.json file


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[generateLicenseFileFunction?](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.iembeddeddependencieswebpackpluginoptions.generatelicensefilefunction.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

[LicenseFileGeneratorFunction](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.licensefilegeneratorfunction.md)


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Function that generates the license file. Defaults to the plugin's internal default generator function but allows you to override it


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[outputFileName?](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.iembeddeddependencieswebpackpluginoptions.outputfilename.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

string


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Name of the file to be generated. Defaults to embedded-dependencies.json


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[packageFilterPredicate?](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.iembeddeddependencieswebpackpluginoptions.packagefilterpredicate.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

(packageJson: [IPackageData](./webpack-embedded-dependencies-plugin.ipackagedata.md)<></>, filePath: string) =&gt; boolean


</td><td>

**_(BETA)_** _(Optional)_ Predicate function that determines whether a package should be included in the embedded dependencies file or the generated license file.


</td></tr>
